name: Light & Shadow (ProPuke)
description:
A GAME OF LIGHT & SHADOW

-> PLAY IN CHROME OR FIREFOX. Other browsers are unhappy :(

CAPTURE 75% OR HAVE THE MOST AREA AFTER 3 MINUTES
BUILD COMBOS WITH YOUR PADDLE TO UNLOCK BOMBS
SET OFF LOTS OF BOMBS TO UNLOCK SUPER POWERS

Made in 48 hours for LuxJam
No engines, frameworks or libraries used;
Just a fun little tinker from scratch.
Written in Typescript.

CREDITS

Code and stuff - ProPuke
Music & sfx - RayMarch
